full_threads.body:
Lots of exciting projects in the work. 🚀

Thanks to @Cindy Valderama for running these meetings and coordinating the Wolf Pack.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Fathom <no-reply@fathom.video>
Date: Mon, May 19, 2025 at 10:21 AM
Subject: Recap for "Wolfpack Projects Sync"
To: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>


Meeting Purpose Weekly project sync for Wolf IQ's web development team to discuss progress, priorities, and new projects. Key Takeaways - 15 website development projects in progress, including 3 new builds (Diesel Link, Ajin Bili) - LifeWorks project is top priority and at risk; team to focus on completing remaining pages this week - New streamlined process: design 3 pages for client approval, then proceed to full site development - Team celebrating wins: services pages live, Little Scribblers design, MGA icon updates Topics Project Status Overview - 15 items on website development list (including designs) - 6 custom projects nearing completion - 2 new customers onboarded: Diesel Link and Ajin Bili - 3 completed items for LifeWorks: single location, service, and home page - 3 projects in final stages: MGA, All Parks, and Omni - 5 projects on track, 5 new projects incoming Priority Projects and Updates - LifeWorks: Top priority, at risk. Joel to provide progress updates on ClickUp - MGA: Glen to complete by Wednesday for client review - Lion website: Will assigned 12 pages for development; only 3 designs needed for approval - Hoss Portal: New client, will follow 3-page design approval process - HD Speech: Paused; Andy to create loom walkthrough for dev team - Diesel Link: One-page design completed, ready for client approval Design Team Tasks (Jaime) 1. Nordi Plumbing (in progress) 2. Hoss Portal (two pages) 3. Semis on Viva and Gage (low priority, needs review) 4. MGA stock photos for patient story page 5. Secondary priorities: Allura, Unearth, Uncobeta, Lively Fisio Development Team Tasks - LifeWorks (Joel & Will): Top priority, focus on completing remaining pages - AcuFelt (Joel): Pending client feedback, polish design - Shellshocked (Will): Completed, needs QA - MGA (Glen): Few more items, deadline Wednesday - Ajin Bili (Joel): Exploring ways to rebuild/recover site Workload Distribution - Joel: Managing 19 tickets, some easy to complete - Glen: Requested to allocate 4 hours/day for priorities, 4 hours for tickets - Will: Assigned Lion website development (12 pages) Next Steps - Joel to provide LifeWorks progress updates on ClickUp - Will to review and prioritize Shellshocked project today - Cindy to QA Shellshocked and provide feedback - Joel and Will to continue work on LifeWorks, focusing on filter page - Andy to create loom walkthrough for HD Speech project - Jaime to prioritize design tasks as listed - Team to implement new 3-page design approval process for new projects - Cindy to email LifeWorks client with progress report and inquire about filter assistance - Joel to explore alternative approaches for Ajin Bili site recovery
Internal Meeting
Wolfpack Projects Sync
May 19, 2025 • 18 mins • View Meeting or Ask Fathom
Action Items ✨
Update LifeWorks progress on ClickUp; work w/ Will on remaining pages
Joel Maligalig
Complete MGA project by Wednesday
Glen Tenorio
Design 2 more main pages for Lion website (in addition to approved home)
Jaime Velasquez
Create loom walkthrough for HD Speech project for dev team
Andy Crebar
Continue Nordi Plumbing design as priority; design 2 Host Portal pages for approval
Jaime Velasquez
Assist w/ MGA patient story page stock photos
Jaime Velasquez
Update client on completed Diesel Link design; QA Will's Shell Shocked work
Cindy Valderama
Move things around & polish AcuFelt design per client discussion; set up GitHub for Adjin Bili & explore alternative approaches
Joel Maligalig
Meeting Summary ✨
General Template Customize • Change Template

Meeting Purpose

Weekly project sync for Wolf IQ's web development team to discuss progress, priorities, and new projects.

Key Takeaways

  • 15 website development projects in progress, including 3 new builds (Diesel Link, Ajin Bili)

  • LifeWorks project is top priority and at risk; team to focus on completing remaining pages this week

  • New streamlined process: design 3 pages for client approval, then proceed to full site development

  • Team celebrating wins: services pages live, Little Scribblers design, MGA icon updates

Topics

Project Status Overview

  • 15 items on website development list (including designs)

  • 6 custom projects nearing completion

  • 2 new customers onboarded: Diesel Link and Ajin Bili

  • 3 completed items for LifeWorks: single location, service, and home page

  • 3 projects in final stages: MGA, All Parks, and Omni

  • 5 projects on track, 5 new projects incoming

Priority Projects and Updates

  • LifeWorks: Top priority, at risk. Joel to provide progress updates on ClickUp

  • MGA: Glen to complete by Wednesday for client review

  • Lion website: Will assigned 12 pages for development; only 3 designs needed for approval

  • Hoss Portal: New client, will follow 3-page design approval process

  • HD Speech: Paused; Andy to create loom walkthrough for dev team

  • Diesel Link: One-page design completed, ready for client approval

Design Team Tasks (Jaime)

  1. Nordi Plumbing (in progress)

  2. Hoss Portal (two pages)

  3. Semis on Viva and Gage (low priority, needs review)

  4. MGA stock photos for patient story page

  5. Secondary priorities: Allura, Unearth, Uncobeta, Lively Fisio

Development Team Tasks

  • LifeWorks (Joel & Will): Top priority, focus on completing remaining pages

  • AcuFelt (Joel): Pending client feedback, polish design

  • Shellshocked (Will): Completed, needs QA

  • MGA (Glen): Few more items, deadline Wednesday

  • Ajin Bili (Joel): Exploring ways to rebuild/recover site

Workload Distribution

  • Joel: Managing 19 tickets, some easy to complete

  • Glen: Requested to allocate 4 hours/day for priorities, 4 hours for tickets

  • Will: Assigned Lion website development (12 pages)

Next Steps

  • Joel to provide LifeWorks progress updates on ClickUp

  • Will to review and prioritize Shellshocked project today

  • Cindy to QA Shellshocked and provide feedback

  • Joel and Will to continue work on LifeWorks, focusing on filter page

  • Andy to create loom walkthrough for HD Speech project

  • Jaime to prioritize design tasks as listed

  • Team to implement new 3-page design approval process for new projects

  • Cindy to email LifeWorks client with progress report and inquire about filter assistance

  • Joel to explore alternative approaches for Ajin Bili site recovery
